content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of an airplane i had hered and upon review i noticed that i had found to my suprise that there was a shinny metal u.F.O spying on and immediately getting behind it and takeing off in a completly different direction. totally mind blowing.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: U.F.O "spies & defies" reflective sphere defies gravity! mach 5 plus

content.detailedDescription: I was getting in my car to leave on a saturday morning and was just getting in when i noticed what looked like three meteors going in different directions. i then noticed what looked like a reflective object in the sky slowly following the flight path of the larger meteor. i ran in the house leaving the car door open and went to get my camera and wake my wife and son. they came out and saw the meteors, but the did not see the ufo. luckily i had taken the picture before they got outside. i have a picture of the object and video of the meteors. i thought it was funny that i didn't hear anything about meteors on that day, because i am sure they were meteors. and at least three of them.
content.summary: I was watching 3 meteors and noticed the ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I was talking with my friend by the north packery channel parking area. i thought that what i saw was a pelican hovering over the dunes back and forth. this can be a very common sight, so i didn't pay much attention at first. from where we were standing the parking lot lights were the orange color hps type, i thought the glow was just reflecting off the chest of the pelican. after a few minutes i looked back towards the dunes and thought a reflection couldn't be that bright. it was then i realized this was not a late night glowing,hovering pelican, but something even more strange! i whipped out my 5 year old beat up lg smartphone, shot the required terrible movie images and then it slowly and silently rose to the northeast and vanished. it was a slow steady rise to the left and disappeared into the darkness, maybe a mile away. blew my mind! i have perfect vision and was not doing any drugs or alcohol!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have never seen anything like this. it was at night and for a few minuted i thought it was just a bird hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping in my bedroom when i sensed that something/someone was looking at me, so i opened my eyes. my night light was on, so i could see clearly somewhat. at the side/foot of my bed were small, 3-4 feet in height, dark gray entities, about 15 of them. one of them was seated on the floor, one was doing a one-handed hand-stand (it looked malevolent). the others were standing, looking at me, seeming as scared of me as i was of them. they had slim, humanoid bodies, proportional heads and bodies, with not more than 10-20% body fat. their faces were flat, i couldn't see their noses and mouths, and i couldn't see any genitals. they had the darkest, bushiest eyebrows/eyes. composed of only 2 colors, with their bodies a dark gray, and their eyes, the darkest charcoal black. they looked like spiderman's enemy, venom, only smaller versions. 

i got up, screamed,"oh my god, oh my god," ran past them (because the bedroom door was behind them) into my daughter's room. when i came back about 2 minutes later, they were gone. before this, i had never seen anything like them in my entire life.
content.summary: I saw entities, small 3-4 ft tall, gray, slim with dark eyes, bushy, thick eyebrows in my bedroom, about 15 of them, some of them looked as scared as i was, some of them malevolent-looking.They looked like venom of spiderman,with proportional bodies/heads

content.detailedDescription: My brother in law yelled at us saying  come out here and look at this. it's another one. all of us went outside and watched this thing slowly move above the horizon and dart left and right. dropping sometimes and then going back up. it did this for a few mins. we all watched then suddenly it took off fast. like it wasn't even there
content.summary: Came right above horizon flew with changing elevation also darting left and right before finally disappearing totally

content.detailedDescription: Its hard toexplain but after 1 am on 4/21/2013 me ad my family witnessed this event i have 2 videos
content.summary: We thought it was a star until it started vibrating n blinkin ad then it movedand was chnging colors no sound was heard

content.detailedDescription: I saw a light in the sky just hovering then it came down and took me away it done some tests on me i was so sceard then the ufo landed and left me stranded some where then i saw a car coming it drove me back home.
content.summary: I saw a light hovering in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Looked out window at 4:40 am..Noticed round orange craft flyind overhead..Ran to other window for better look..Craft pulsating orange and totally silent..Watched,it fly out of view..Unknown craft since it was totally silent..Flew overhead and out of sight withiin a couple minutes...
content.summary: Noticed pulsating craft flying over head.Orange pulsate..No sound ar all.....

content.detailedDescription: For the past few years now i have been going out to nordegg alberta to watch the skies. on a clear night from about 2-3am a solid light object can be seen flying arount the sky, brighter than a star and moves in every direction. when me or the people that i am with try and film or take a picture with an iphone, asbsoon as the phone focuses on the object it goes invisable. i have taken many people out to witness this and said to them.... watch as soon as your phone focuses on it it will dissapear.. and it does. it brightens up again uasually about 5 munites later everytime in a compleatly diffrent spot. i watch this everytime i go to nordegg. i have a 5mv green laser pen the goes 5 miles and on one occasion i have flashed it at this object and idbpulsated red back once for every three times i flashed it. i would also shine the laser directly at it and it would force the object to dart around to avoid it in every direction. i have many witnesses to this event as i was not alone. i can take anyone to nordegg and show them this on any clear night. i have never seen anything accelerate as fast as these objects nor have the ability to hover and dissapear. whatever they are they are intelligent. if anyone wants to see a ufo for real nordegg is the place, they are always there.
content.summary: Ufos can be watched any clear night around nordegg alberta from 2-3 am. cannot film with iphone as soon as phone auto focuses the object dissapears like it knowes its being filmed.

content.detailedDescription: In august of 1975 i was about to become a senior in high school. i and a young lady friend were driving around a small, quiet rural iowa town just talking. i saw to the west, five brilliant white lights. the very high brightness of the lights is what first caught my attention. each white light was about twice as large as an average star in the sky, in a chevron shape. the point of the chevron was pointing east, and the chevron appeared to be slowly and silently moving east. at first i thought maybe it was a military formation of aircraft, high up, heading from the west to the east. the strategic air command (sac) south of omaha, is located west of the town's location. the lights were first seen by me at about 40 degrees above the western horizon, while driving west. the sun had set within the half hour, but sunlight still existed below the western horizon. we drove to a nearby school football field location, where trees would not obstruct our view of the moving chevron shaped lights. the weather was clear with no breeze and no sound at all. the chevron formation continued to slowly & silently get closer until it was about 85 degrees up from the western horizon. the ufo was high in altitude in the sky, maybe about as high as a commercial aircraft. at this point, a new, small pinpoint of light started blinking several colors at the center point location of all the much larger white lights in the chevron shape. the colors being blinked were red, green and white in a random pattern that sometimes repeated any one of the three colors. even the blinking frequency or lack of blinking was random in timing. at this point the five large white chevron lights were appearing larger than when we had first seen them. from our perspective on the ground, the five white lights were now the size of buttons, only with some 3-d depth on them. all five of the larger white button size white lights in chevron formation all simultaneously started to slowly converge on the pinpoint of the blinking light.(in the middle of the large white lights) at the moment the five lights all converged on top of each other, there was a bright flash of white light and the ufo instantaneously shot off into outer space in a north-northeasterly direction at a steep angle away from earth. there appeared to be a momentary light trail following the ufo out into space. it was viewable for less than a second and was multi-colorful. the young lady i was with seemed concerned and wanted to go home immediately. i took her home and then went to my uncle and aunt's home. i was both scared and yet very excited at the same time. i told my uncle and aunt about this occurrence and that we must call the air force immediately. my uncle's response repeated several times was a firm no. he did not want the family to be associated with the occurrence, or notifying the air force. in the summer of 1975, i was a high school student spending the summer living with my uncle & aunt, while working on the family farms in iowa...I did as i was told and did not spread this story beyond family and a few close friends. that was all over 35 years ago now.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 eastbound points of white light in chevron formation, went to silent hover, lights slowly combined into one flash and ufo shot into space

content.detailedDescription: Was  playing with older brother and sister on front lawn  ufo was huge with  dome top  latest about  2 minutes. got our mom who was speechless when she saw ufo. she called police. next day 2 men slight build strangely identical looking, one had lt grey suit, other  black. insisted we did not see anything though our mom told them we did. ufo stayed under 500 ft, felt like it was watching us as  soon as we moved into the street from our lawn the ufo followed us to the  street in a sharp fast totally silent maneuver, and would position it  self  directly above us. when our mom observed the ufo it stayed in position until my mom told us to get inside , then the ufo ascended in a westerly direction so fast i don't believe  that technology is from any earthly source.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Completely silent; would follow exactly over head our moves

content.detailedDescription:
I was staying at my brothers trailer the evening this took place. i want to say i was around 16yrs old at the time. i'm 33 now and what reminded me of the event was when i was watching alien mysteries on destination truth about the kecksburg sighting years ago. the reenactment of the witnesses description looked and acted exactly like what i witnessed just north of loami, il. 

i had got bored and decided to take a walk through the trailer park around 9-9:30pm. i was facing north and seen what at first i thought to be a meteor falling to the ground but it didn't fall to the ground, it was moving from east to west in a downward path but stopped and changed direction and moved back towards the east. it then stopped again and moved back west hovered for a bit then began moving again towards the ground where i had lost sight of it for a moment, it suddenly came back into the air and moved east once again then back west and back towards the ground where i did not see it again. 

when it would move it appeared to have a tail of flame coming from it and the tail would change direction with the ufo. 

like i said it appeared to be a meteor at first engulfed in flames but its movement was not the movement of a falling meteor, which i have witnessed several times, and can tell the difference. a meteor does not change direction several times, land, return to the air, fly around a bit longer then land again. 

all in all i would say the entire event lasted approximately 5mins. i couldnt believe what i had seen. it was pretty amazing, had i been in my vehicle at the time i would have tried to follow it and find where it landed. it was much to far away to get to it in time. it was probably a mile to 2 miles north of loami and west of springfield, il

i returned to my brothers trailer and described what i had seen but no one believed me, they all assumed i was joking or had seen a meteor.

there is another incident that i wrote off as a dream at the time and has nothing to do with this sighting. 

i remember waking up in my bed but not being able to move, in the corner of the room was a tall very skinny version of a normal sized "grey" alien with the large black eyes. standing closer to my bed were two shorter, normal sized greys. they seemed to just be starring at me and that's all that i remember. i was much younger probably 10-13yrs old. throughout my life i've had many occasions where i wake up in bed and can't move. i try to scream for help but nothing comes out and there is always a very strong, overwhelming feeling of not being alone. like i am being watched, but i have never witnessed anything in the room with me other than when i had seen the greys when i was young. maybe it was all just my imagination and i have read of instances where you are half asleep and half awake but can't move or talk because essentially your body is still asleep. not sure what the correct term for that is. i pretty much wrote the first event off as a dream and all the other times as the half awake half asleep thing. not sure if you guys are even interested in any of that, just figured i would share it.
content.summary: An bright object with a tail of flame that at first looked like a meteor but changed directions several times made a controlled landing, then returned to the air, flew a bit more then landed again.

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 9:20 p.M. was in the backyard letting my dog out to go.  looked up in sky and in a period of less than 8 minutes or so, saw 6 objects omitting an orange-red star like light travel in the same path and disappear into the sky.  they appeared sequentially, one, then two, then three. went back in the house, came out a moment later and counted three more do the same thing, a little more spaced out this time. there was no noise emitted by these crafts or whatever they were.  live near an airport but these things were definitely not planes.  they sort of floated across the sky in the same diagonal direction and did not take the path to the airport that planes would.  i remember saying to myself, ""what in the *%^& are those things?!" i ran to the front yard to see if any of my neighbors were outside but they were not.  i spoke with one who pulled up in the cul de sac just after this event had occurred but he stated that he had just gotten out of his vehicle and had not seen anything.
content.summary: Saw six objects with orange lights float in same path and disappear into the sky.

content.detailedDescription: i spotted a ufo hovering about 100 yards away in front of my apartment complex. i then went back in to my apartment to get my 2 guests to confirm what i just saw. we all witnessed the disc shape craft rotating while hovering stationary. green, blue, white, red, and yellow lights flashed and pulsated. the craft then descended and looked as it may have landed. all the street lights flickered on and off when the craft descended. for all i know it's still out there. we watched the craft for 20 min and i decided it was time to leave.
content.summary: Ufo was witnessed by 3 people hovering and then decending with pulsating and flashing many different color lights

content.detailedDescription:
Object noted "floating"; size, movement, etc., eliminated floating spider web, trash, pollen. moved very slowly upward and to left.Then vanished.
sun higher and to right of object.
ground wind speed 2 mph per weather instrument.
content.summary: Floating object observed in clear sky

content.detailedDescription: On 9-10-11 at 7:45 pm, i lived in the yavapai desert approx. 15 miles sw of seligman,az.I heard a noise under my tralior i thought it was an animal, so i grabbed my fifle and wentoutside walked to the front of my trailor, i held my rifle as in a position to shoot, as soon as i got to the front of my trailor i saw a large flying obect that appeared tome to be on fire, i lowered my rifle pointing to the ground and my mouth dropped to the ground, i watched this object fly by it seemed to me to be in slow motion, it was disc shaped and it was horizontle, wtih blue, green orange and yellow flames on the top, it also had a tail, dont remember the color. i watched it until it went over the mountains going toward seligman arizona. i thought to myself that if it crashed it would be a very bad explosion. i didnt hear anything. this object was quiet as it flew by me. it was very low and seemed to be going the way of highway 40 ne. i ran in my trailor called my friends and they didnt believe me. so i grabbed my camera and start taking photo's of the sky sw area of the sky. there were no lights from city or homes as it was in the desert, it was dark outside. the next morning my friend called me and told me that a ufo had been seen in arizona nevada and california. (not so crazy now) i transfered the photo's from camera to my computer as i have a large monitor. they photo's were dark of course it was dark outside. i noticed little red spots in the photo's and so enlarged them, to my surprise i captured many lights and objects in the sky. i shared my photos with friends and they said that on of the crafts looked like the uss enterprise. obviously they thought it was a joke. but it was acctual crafts in the sky.
content.summary: 7:45 i heard noise under trailor, went outside and saw flying by me, my mouth dropped i just watched, had blue,green,orange yellow in front of it and a tail

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were sitting in the back yard enjoy a fire and talking . when i noticed a red orange glowing ball coming from the north passing directly over my house . told him look and he went to get his mother and brother and then my son pulled out his cell phone and begin to record it we stood and watched it pass over until
it disappeared
content.summary: Bright red orange color moving fast

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
just north of houston, tx. we were laying in the backyard, looking up at the night sky, we like to watch the stars, etc. at night. sometimes the iss soars overhead or a meteor shower can be seen so we like to take advantage of the lack of light pollution when we can.


2. what made you first notice the object?
it was kinda... foggy way up in the sky where there should not be fog. it didn't look like clouds although there were sprinkled, wispy clouds around the area (not where the craft was, the sky was clear there except for this fog stuff). 

i said, "hey, check out that light... it is really way up there. that's way higher than the typical aircraft isn't it?" (a few moments later) "dude seriously look. that @#$(& is not moving... it is way too bright and not blinking (like a commercial airplane/heli) at all... it is just sitting there. what is that? do you see that?!" 


3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

honestly, aliens. we're nerds, of course we thought aliens. but, in serious terms, i/we knew it was something other than the airplanes, satellites and iss we sometimes see (have seen) passing over the location. we have lived here about 4 years now and this is definitely not normal for the area. 

i'm sorry, but i thought instantly, "there has to be some other explanation, no @#$(& way are we seeing what i think we are." i spent the rest of the week trying to confirm anything that could explain what we saw without "aliens" being the explanation. no dice. 


4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.

after i spotted the anomaly, witness 2 confirmed visual. the first light pulsed slowly once or twice, then slowly a second light off to the left of the first light began to illuminate and became very bright, just like the first one. the lights were very organic, there was no "on/off" like a switch or signal, it was all very gentle and slow to light up and pulse like an exaggerated fire fly.

the two lights then pulsed slowly, first in answer to one another, then in synchronization/unison. the lights were golden/white/amber colored (varied) and very large and very round (easy shape, no shifting). 

after both myself and my friend discussed what we were seeing, the craft came down. i don't know how to explain it other than, at first, we saw bright lights through a foggy facade, then the craft came down and we could clearly see the ship with the fog just behind or above it. it was a black skinned craft or at least non-reflective. this next part makes me feel stupid to say, but, it sort of resembled the "batwing" shape used to signal batman. (omg please, i'm sorry to discredit with batman >< ) 

it was not stealth bomber shaped like our bombers (triangle), it was not like any aircraft or prototype i know of (fixed wing, kit, rc or recon and please, i know i'm not an expert but i do follow aircraft body styles for years now) or even conspiratorial shaped rumored craft (some of the more... 'creative' reports i've seen, this was not like that). 

this was, again, organic in shape, very flowing and curved and natural .. simply put it was a very beautiful silhouette of a black ship. this craft featured at least two very bright lights on the bottom, closer to the perimeter of the ship on "either side". i could see such lights positioned in that manner being helpful for landing (like flood lights or alley lights on a squad car), but this craft did not land or make any move to do so. 

after it descended a small bit (like i said, it was very high in the sky, so this descending still left it pretty far above our heads) and we got a very good confirmation of what we saw (no guessing was possible at that point as the fogginess was no longer between the craft and our eyes) - it seems like time kinda stretched out in a weird way. if we had been online, i would describe it like we were having a latency issue or "lag" for a minute - we had a strange non-physical impression of communication (contents below). then everything snapped back to normal speed...The craft slowly rotated a bit farther to the east (originally ne) and moved off very slowly, gracefully. no trail or track or disruption in the "fog" or the clouds in the area (and an entirely different altitude than the "fog") was apparent. 


5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

after everything was over, we felt pretty humbled to have been allowed to see this. but at first we were in disbelief and incredulous and feeling a little silly. 

during the event, and as indicated above after the craft "came down" a little, the non-physical/emotional wave hit us. it was really definite. it unwaveringly did feel like the craft was there on purpose, that exact spot and time as we were lying on our backs looking straight up at the sky. it absolutely did feel as if the craft was benevolent or perhaps the beings inside it were/are benevolent, if there were any beings (that part i would have no way to know, we could not see anything like that). we did not feel threatened or scared, never mind the fact that this massive object was exactly above our house with the kids asleep inside (which would normally have sent me into fits). quite honestly, there was nothing negative about this experience - it felt strongly at the time that a transmission was sent but i can't tell you the means of transmission. here is what i received although it does not translate out exactly - "be at ease. yes, yes, we are here. thank you, thank you for being aware of us - we are most honored. we are visiting [you all] to say hello, we will return later in a more long-term capacity, we will not leave you again."  

other than not immediately understanding the implications of the message, the feeling was very loving and connected but a bit formal and * very official *. the words "here", "aware", "you all" really felt more like, "we are now permitted to let you know we are are here", "thank you for bringing us into your awareness", and "the waiting ones" or "those who are watching for us". the words don't fully communicate what was transmitted but that's my best recollection - it was very intense and happy. 


6. how did you lose sight of the object?

it left. i guess there was more on the agenda that night than just hanging out in houston with a couple of nerds in the back yard  ;) .
content.summary: Bright lights in sky, very high, stationary. lights pulsed twice, craft descended below cloud bank then rotated and headed east. completely silent.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i was at my cousins house in elk creek kentucky. it was july 3,2011. warm, beautiful night. the next door neighbor was shooting fireworks off. my wife and cousin went on the front porch to water flowers in hanging baskets. i stayed in the house with my other cousin. my wife opened the door and told us to come outside because they were seeing lights in the sky. i went out and saw three orange lights in the east. they were a fair distance at first. we went off the porch to the front yard. the left and right lights started approaching. the center light stayed. the neighbor was shooting off fireworks as they approached. the left ship had got ahead of the right one. it stopped and waited for it to catch up. they then continued approaching side by side with a little distance between them. this happened in a mountain valley. it was a very trapped feeling. we don't see a lot of sky. i knew they were getting close, but i was to amazed to be scared at the time. they came all the way up to us,hovering very low. it was very plain to see they were black triangles with a yellowish/white light in each corner. they just sat there. i was waiting for something to happen. this was the most intense, unbelievable feeling. i was ready for battle and had a feeling of peace. very  disturbing yet excited. my cousin had one of those huge,long maglights. she shined the light on it. the light beam made the surface turn into a metallic charcoal color. like a greyish metal flake. it was amazing because these ships were pitch black. with one on my left, and one on the right and they just sat there. i was starting to fear the maglight was a bad idea. i was looking at the left ship, it lifted straight up, but not very far. sat and then zipped away instantly. the light trail made it an obvious southwest direction. one on the right sat another 15 seconds did the same as the first but northwest direction. no missing time. one of the cousins who witnessed this died in a freak accident on vacation 15 days later. my father soon after. there were a lot of family deaths afterword. i wondered if it was connected. i have seen these ships on many shows. exact matches. but we did not see the red light in the center. these were not gigantic. lost track of the third, just gone.
content.summary: Wife & cousin saw 3 orange lights approaching. got me and another cousin. witnessed  lights come up to us, hovered over 2 triangles.Shown maglight on ship looked charcoal coloer in beam. rest of ship remained dark. sped off one after other very fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the interstate with my wife and i all of a sudden saw the swarm straight ahead in the sky im guessing about 2-500 feet in the air and i pulled off the shoulder and tried to record with my cell but it did not pick up on my phone my wife did get a couple of photos before the last two disappeared they appeared to be moving straight across the sky and when they got to a certain spot they would appear to flicker out one at a time as they reached that particular point i took my wifes phone and zoomed in on the photos and the objects appear to be boomerang shaped but could be because of the movement not sure.
content.summary: Was about 30 or 40 objects in a swarm like formation

content.detailedDescription: Flickering light that quickly moved in sky that did not seem possible for man made aircraft
content.summary: Eradic movement that cannot be sustained my any known human designed plan/helicopter

content.detailedDescription: I was living at a house on plesant st. in ashland in 1998.My ex wife was across the street at dairy mart working.I was over at the house by myself doing a study,sitting on the floor.There were bay windows on my right,with vanecian blinds over 4 of them.So i couldnt see out;only slightly along the edge. i saw a bright blue flash which lit the whole room where i was sitting. i looked in the direction of the edge of the 1st blind twards the front right side of the house.What i thought was some one got stoped by the police and their lights were reflecting off the white house next door.So i went back to what i was doing,and the next thing i know im not sitting up any more.Im laying on my left side.(i dont remember laying down)i had my head proped up on something(but nothing was aparent)i cant move. in front of me is a being aprox.4 1/2 ft.Tall the skin tone was like tobaco spit.It had large liquidy black eyes, no ears,no nose,it had a bunched up collar of black cloth around its neck,(possibly a hood).It had a large head that made a short spiral twards the ears.It hah wrinkles around its mouth,like it was old.It had either a hump back or something was under its tunic i guess youd call it, that came mid way to the back of its head.The air looked liquidy.As i layed on my left side,it was standing with its left side facing tward my head as i was looking up slightly.I never observed it move at all.I sensed there were 3 other beings there also,but i couldnt move to look at them.The next thing i know im sitting up again in my original position and their gone. i thought it looked darker than before. i think i had missing time.I could not think of anything else for 3 days.The feeling i got was very intense.The being was different, but dident look scary.Perhapse it was an energy state that made me feel that way.I saw a picture at the mansfield public library that look like this,they called them zata recticulans.
content.summary: See flash outside im sitting then laying see being black eyes cant move sense 3 others air liquidy im sitting again their gone

content.detailedDescription: Just got off work,going down forth st.At the bridge i could see tward mansfield.I see a big object over that way, its dark out but i see lights.I get off onto u.S.30 east.When i get down by the 13 exit a little before that by the steel mill i see an object with 3 white lights in a triangle shape traveling from south to north.It was traveling twards the flat side of its triangle shape,instead of its pointed side.As it came over my vehicle i heard a womans voice in my head say hi jim.As it went over tward the north it dove down, this thing was as big a c5a.Then turned right then left and gained in altitude slightly then headed west.How did she know me?How did she talk to me from up there?How did she pick me to say hi out of all the cars on the road?Who is she?
content.summary: Saw 3 lights big went north over highway 30 right over my head hear womans voice say my name dives turns right then left twards the west out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog at the time and looked in the sky to see a diamond, reflective object that hovered and then twisted to disappear into the sky. i took off running to report it so it would all be fresh as it happened
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Was out on a run with my dog at the exact time and saw a silver, diamond object in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was on my trampoline outside with my sister. 
2. we were jumping around and i looked up and saw it at an 80 degree angle in the sky (with 90 degrees being straight up, perpendicular to the ground).
3. i was unsure, but it didn't look like anything i've ever seen before. i knew it was a ufo.
4. the ufo was a black disc with a single, red, blinking light on one edge. the object flipped very slowly, around one rotation every five seconds. it did not spin around an axis from top-to-bottom, but instead on an axis from side-to-side, through the edge, so that it flipped front over back. when it you watched it, it was flipping in the direction it was moving.  it moved very slowly as well, and it took around three minutes to become a tiny speck on the horizon.
5. i felt amazed and curious. i didn't really know what to think.
6. the object eventually got too far away to see clearly, until it was not visible at all.
content.summary: Black disc with single blinking red dot.  rotated in a flipping motion.

content.detailedDescription: They came to me in my crib and they hovered above my mattress.  they were orbs colored in blue, green and yellow. they were beautiful. they levitated, formed a circle around me, colored titanium white and began to circle me counter clockwise rapidly.  they came into my body around my waist.  the next thing i knew they were leaving through the closed window and turned back into orbs.  while playing with them i felt joy, safe, as though they were familiar to me.  when they left, i felt heartbroken.  i knew i would never see them again.  i am missing time from this event.  i want to know what they are, and what happened to me.
content.summary: They came to me in my crib, let me play with them until they left, missing time.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside waiting for my bus, then it came.
i noticed it when i looked at the sky.
i always look up at the sky.
content.summary: Blue green lights and zoomed past

content.detailedDescription: Heading down  bonds flat road heading to sonora ca for a typical day of work for my cleaning service.While approaching the entrance to flemming meadows recreation entrance at bonds flat road, la grange ca  lake side. i saw something large reflecting sunlight from the rear of it,it was so blinding to me i could not take my eyes off of it. it was so brightly reflecting the sun it made me pull my truck off the road to the curb.The reflections giving off the light were like two large window panels reflecting the sun that was just coming up 40 degrees above horizon to the east over lake don pedro.I had no idea what the heck i was looking at it had no details of our current modern aircraft more like a flying submarine shaped like a bottle than any winged plane or propellar cropped helicopter. (it was none of those)it was hovering panning left to right moving up then down slightly panning left to right so slowly it was bizzar to see its movement unlike any aircraft i have ever seen made me feel excited because i knew i was finally witnessing my first ufo and i was actually screeming with joy at this freaky wierd object and trying to get my cell phone to turn on to snap shots with my iphone but the phone was acting up and would not function at all not even the phone would work with my sync capabilities. i could not even get my ford flex system to turn on the bluetooth audio devise to make an emergency call..So i just anxiously continued to watch it without taking my eyes off of it i,becoming really very emotional, i even started to cry a little and ask it to not go away..Please come back..But it did not listen to me ofcourse and kept its flight pattern hovering again straight over the field towards the hilltops south west.As it panned more to the left i was able to  make out what was described as a dark coal-colored,wine bottle shaped cylindrical object moving slowly before disappearing to the south west like a blink of an eye it just dissapeared . it blinked out so fast  no trails no chem trail no sound no sonic boom just vanished in then air .So amazing !Like a razor cutting into another demention beyond human sight.I knew for sure i was going to be another major witness to an amazing sighting and i will be changed for ever because of this event..I have been continously trying to convince my community,my family and friends that we are in great urgency to band together as we the people to get the truth about ufo technologies and the disclosure of the truth to be revealed whatever it takes i am willing to support mufon, the disclosure project.And any and all other independant disclosure groups that need the truth to be heard...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: While approaching the don pedro dam along highway 132, stensland said she saw something large reflecting sunlight that appeared to be moving over the hilltops. then she could make out what she described as a coal-colored, cylindrical object moving slowly

content.detailedDescription:
Shelton, ct - ufo sighting- early 1970's

one friday evening i was driving northeast on rt.110 heading to my sister's house in shelton, ct. it was approx. 6:30 or 7:00 pm. it was dark out, so it must have been late fall or winter. the roads were clear and it was not raining or snowing. i would say it was a clear night. i made this trip every week at the same time to visit my sister and her family. as i was driving, i noticed an extremely bright light low in the sky. it was brighter than any star i had ever seen. it was not high up in the sky, where you would expect to see stars, but lower. because i was heading in its direction, i kept trying to figure out what it was because i had never noticed it there before. i thought the light was coming from a hospital-type facility near my sister's house but realized it couldn't be coming from there. then as i got closer, i thought it was coming from a street lamp but realized that the light was above the tree tops. (i even thought perhaps it was a spy satellite because there is a huge aircraft company in the area. however, the aircraft company was several miles back the other way and if this was a spy satelite it was way off course.) as i got even closer to it, i could see that it was staying in one spot, sort of rotating but pulsating at the same time. since it was above me, as i turned to go up the road to my sister' house, i couldn't tell how big it was. it made me a little nervous, and i wasn't about to get out of my car for a closer look. 

this super bright, pulsating orb intrigued me more than scared me. i felt that it was no ordinary object. it was a little spooky. i was glad to get off the road and get inside my sister's house. when i got to my sister's house, i told all of them that i just saw a ufo over their property. everyone said i must have been mistaken etc., etc.

the next day, my sister called me at home and said i was right about the ufo sighting and that she was reading the local newspaper that morning (saturday) and it said that at least 100 people had called the police the night before saying that they had spotted a ufo. i wished that i had asked her to save a copy of that newspaper so that i could remember the exact date when this event occured.

i have never forgotten this event and i can still see it clearly in my mind's eye.  the impact of it has stayed with me for more than 40 years.
content.summary: Early 70's - shelton, ct - very bright object, stationary position, pulsating light, white color, spherical shape and silent.
